made-me-forget.hebrew: וַיִּקְרָא יוֹסֵף אֶת־שֵׁם הַבְּכוֹר מְנַשֶּׁה כִּי־נַשַּׁנִי אֱלֹהִים אֶת־כָּל־עֲמָלִי וְאֵת כָּל־בֵּית אָבִי
made-me-forget.english: Joseph named the firstborn Manasseh: 'For God has made me forget all my hardship and all my father's house'

the-firstborn.english: He crossed his hands, for Manasseh was the firstborn

left-hand-blessing.english: And his left hand on Manasseh's head

not-so-father.hebrew: לֹא־כֵן אָבִי כִּי־זֶה הַבְּכֹר שִׂים יְמִינְךָ עַל־רֹאשׁוֹ
not-so-father.english: Not so, my father, for this one is the firstborn; put your right hand on his head

he-also-shall-be-great.english: He also shall become a people, and he also shall be great

i-know-my-son.english: I know, my son, I know
